about_the_game:
This is an immersive solo journey, all you have to do is focus on driving. During the long journey, in the white noise brought by the engine and the environment, you slowly gain peace and return to yourself.
Different from real life, this game attempts to provide a relaxation and leisure experience, and provides some interactive content and options for players to choose and adjust. .

Important Tips: If you feel that the game quality does not meet your expectations, please try to select a higher setting in the "Graphics Quality" item under "Settings" on the startup interface and "Save Changes".

Main scenes of the game

  • House: Used for rest and relaxation. There are some interactions, such as add your favorite music to the record player and play it, sit on the sofa and listen to the sound of the fireplace burning, flip through a book, watch white noise TV, enjoy the rocking chair...
  • Garage: Used to select, customize, and modify vehicles. Adjust the body color, replace the tires, adjust the suspension, adjust the car engine performance...
  • Driving: There is a possibility of a series of events happening during the journey...


Aimless driving is worth supporting, especially if you can set the time, weather and music yourself, or even turn on autonomous driving...? You guessed it right! These are indeed totally doable!
As the journey continues, you will gradually unlock more content to experience: Customized weather/time, Music playback, Small animals, Unknown travelers, Gas pumps

However, how about a little goal?

  • Car driving consumes gasoline. You need to obtain resources and find gas pumps to refuel. The resources come from random rewards from hitchhikers.
  • Of course, you can set the car to be perpetually moving, which means you can do whatever you want.
  • Longer driving mileage can unlock more possibilities or be used to redeem special props. Breaking records can be a goal, right?

Of course, you will encounter some common events on the road

for example:
  • (Human Companion) There is someone on the roadside who needs a ride. You can accept or reject it. Chat to relieve boredom during the journey. They may provide rewards or exchange contact information after the journey to become your friend.
  • (Animal companions) Various small animals appear randomly and can interact and become friends.
  • (Personalized random character, open AI chat) He/she/it may become your partner. The length of time is up to you. No matter what, at least we have met each other before

Possible future development content

  • Customized NPC characters (personality, experience, hobbies...)
  • Customized vehicles
  • Customized map
  • The above content can be modded into the creative workshop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 processor or later that's SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: 13th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-13700KF
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce RTX 3060 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: This is an immersive leisure solo journey. All you have to do is focus on driving and enjoy driving. Slowly gain peace and return to yourself in the white noise brought by the engine and the environment.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, French, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Italian, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal
